alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 3:09AM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting 45 to 60 mph in areas exposed to east or northeast winds. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
